lines.text:
[after she runs Jim Henry and his crony off]
Oh, Lord! Please forgive me for backsliding, but sometimes when you fight the Devil you've got to jab him with his own pitchfork!
Give a man money and watch him act funny.
You have a funny feeling, Joe?
I've got a feeling, but it ain't funny!
And I ain't heard a word.

[when he discovers he's in trouble with the Devil]
Oh, me! I'm about the most miserabelest person that ever died!
Georgia, Georgia, remember you're a lady now.
I know it, sugar. I'm just trying to impress them with that fact.

[Petunia orders a drink at Jim Henry's]
What'll it be, Miss Jackson?
You may get me a double King Kong!
